title: EB Create BC5000 10pk
description: Step up your vaping game with the EBCREATE BC5000. It's designed for simplicity and performance, delivering an impressive 5000 puffs per device. The BC5000 features dual mesh coils that ensure each puff is bursting with flavor, activated simply by inhaling. No buttons, just smooth vaping. Each device comes pre-filled with 9.5ml of premium 5%/50mg Salt Nicotine e-liquid, perfect for those who enjoy a satisfying nicotine experience. With a sturdy 650mAh battery, the BC5000 lasts long before needing a recharge. Plus, it charges quickly via USB Type-C, making it compatible with various devices. Whether you're new to vaping or a seasoned pro, the BC5000 promises a reliable, flavorful companion every time.  Key Features  Up to 5000 puffs per device: This feature emphasizes the longevity of the device before needing replacement. With up to 5000 puffs, the BC5000 offers extended use, making it cost-effective and convenient for users who prefer not to frequently change devices. 9.5ml e-liquid capacity for rich flavor: The 9.5ml e-liquid capacity ensures users can enjoy an extended vaping session without the need for frequent refills. This capacity is optimized to enhance the richness and intensity of flavors, providing a satisfying vaping experience. 50mg/ml nicotine strength for a robust hit: The 50mg/ml nicotine strength caters to users who prefer a strong nicotine hit. It's ideal for those who have a higher nicotine tolerance or desire a more intense vaping experience without compromising on flavor quality. 650mAh battery for extended use: The 650mAh battery capacity ensures the device can be used for an extended period before needing to be recharged. This feature is particularly beneficial for users who vape throughout the day and require a reliable battery life.
